name: TC_07_27_01 | Verify that user can create a template
description: Objective: To verify that the user can create a new template in the system successfully. This includes ensuring that all required fields are completed correctly, the template is saved, and it is accessible for future use.
descriptionHtml: Objective: To verify that the user can create a new template in the system successfully. This includes ensuring that all required fields are completed correctly, the template is saved, and it is accessible for future use.

testStage.description: Objective: To verify that the user can create a new template in the system successfully. This includes ensuring that all required fields are completed correctly, the template is saved, and it is accessible for future use.

steps.name: New User Setup: Free User Sign up
Free user sign up API call
New User Setup: Free User Email Confirmation via Database
New User Setup: Free User Login
New User Setup: Upgrade Free User to Business
Click the Settings on the Side Menu
Click on the Billing option in the side menu
Click "No,thanks" button on the One Time Special Offer Modal
A toast message with the text "Plan has been successfully changed." is visible and hidden then
Click the "Templates" item on the left SideMenu
Click the "Create Template" item on the Templates menu
Upload file
